website_summaries.verdict: The 2nd version of the Gel FujiRunnegade from Asics is a durable neutral trail shoe and a responsive training partner for outdoor training. This shoe is designed to give stability and support. This shoe is also great for daily treks and exercises.
pros: The Gel FujiRunnegade 2 features a water-repellent upper
The sock-like fit allows runners to wear it without using socks first
This shoe has an anti-gravel tongue that keeps debris from entering the shoe
The upper of this shoe is directly attached to the mid-sole for comfort and stability
Based on some reviews, the shoe does not disappoint on uphill climbs and downhill traversals
It features a solid rubber outsole for durability and traction
Most runners applauded the overall durable construction of the Asics Gel FujiRunnegade 2
cons: The majority of the complaints were about its narrow heel, which apparently caused blisters to testers
Damp terrain doesn’t do well for the upper fabric, which easily gets soaked and heavy when exposed to splashes of water

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trail runner for muddy wet conditions but you can get it cheaper elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Great for OCR racing.
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I used these for various OCR races and extreme mud running and they grip well. Care for the heel drop though, look into this as these can hurt your calf and heel unless you use a transition shoe. Good quality, good grip, good fit. Only moan I have is that the gaiter is there to stop debris entering the shoe which it does a good job of. Sadly the designer did not have the top stitched to the shoe outer so it gathers in there like a ring of mud and grit to rub against you. They redesigned this tor the version 2 of this shoe which I will soon be purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: SG999

customer_reviews.title: I am sure they helped me get round a lot easier than would have with my old crap slippy trainers and all my teammates were so je
customer_reviews.text: These things are the dogs nuts I am a rather heavy gentleman who recently tackled tough mudder !! I am sure they helped me get round a lot easier than would have with my old crap slippy trainers and all my teammates were so jealous of the grip I had and the way I ploughed though the mud it seemed to me they took miles of the course and would recommend these trail runners to anyone
customer_reviews.author: mr s callaghan

customer_reviews.title: I am really pleased with these overall and would consider buying another pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of grip on wet muddy trails. The neoprene inner sock prevents mud from getting into the shoe. I am really pleased with these overall and would consider buying another pair come the time these have worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Brill on all levels
customer_reviews.text: great shoe, first time i wore them was for my 10K obstacle run and they fit like a glove and the grip is awesome. the neoprene ankle collar was great for keeping twigs and crud out too.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Tons of grip on mud and grass ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Tons of grip on mud and grass but don't wear them on tarmac, it's like wearing football boots.
customer_reviews.author: Bezza

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I've done two big fell runs in them already and they're great. Light and comfortable and cheaper than anything else on the market.
customer_reviews.author: F Craine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great grip on mud, little slippy on wet roads and rocks but that's expected with blades.
customer_reviews.author: Olly Plumstead

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent on trails, mud. Not good on wet tarmac getting to trail.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Alun Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Off-Road Adventure Sports
customer_reviews.text: Just completed the Rat Race Dirty Weekend in these after a very short breaking-in period. Very comfortable, extremely grippy, secure and they keep the mud out. Was a bit concerned how light-weight they are considering I'm a big guy, but over 13+ miles off road I had no problems. Just don't run on-road with these - The huge lugs stick to dirt like Spiderman to a wall, but on tarmac it feels like you're running in football boots.
customer_reviews.author: James P

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfy the fit is great & doing OCR in them is very different to ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfy the fit is great & doing OCR in them is very different to any other I've worn before I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Mark Peace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Done beach and trail runs good grip, but bit slippy when on Tarmac , great overall though
customer_reviews.author: Mr. John R. Bassett

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good in Dry...
customer_reviews.text: Decent trainer, seemingly well made so far and excellent in dry, however terrible in wet. As its an "outdoor" trainer and largely for off road running I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good trainer, drains well
customer_reviews.text: Good trainer, drains well, the "sock" keeps out most of the debris from running through water. Bought two pairs for weekend ocrs
customer_reviews.author: phillip morris

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product with the gaiter providing the required doping for ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product with the gaiter providing the required doping for objects entering. No slip on thick mud and great in water. No issue on unstable ground. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Burns

product_meta.title: ASICS Gel-FUJIRUNNEGADE 2 PLASMAGUARD Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Asics GEL-FUJIRUNNEGADE 2 PLASMAGUARD Running Shoes The mud run shoe that stays spotless. Take on fast and furious mud runs in the Gel-FujiRunnegade. Hurdle obstacles and break through thick sludge with a lightweight design and big lugs on the outsole. The ASICS FujiRunnegade 2 is built for the most difficult terrain. The upper is constructed from a durable closed mesh and an anti-gravel tongue to keep dirt and debris out of your shoe. Protection is enhanced with the addition of Asics' innovative upper coating - PlasmaGuard - which will keep your shoes protected from rain and mud, without sacrificing breathability and flexibility. The midsole is constructed out of Solyte, a lighter weight midsole compound than Asics' standard EVA and SpEVA. It also features enhanced cushioning and durability to keep your feet protected for longer. Whilst a rearfoot GEL cushioning system helps to dissipate shock on ground contact and also encourage a smoother transition from heel strike to midstance. The Gel-FujiRunnegade features Asics' most aggressive and rugged outsole built specifically for the harshest of conditions and the toughest of terrains. The trail specific outsole features deep lugs to grip loose rock and mud, whilst the shape and direction of these lugs provide uphill and downhill traction on all types of offroad terrain.
feature_bullets: PlasmaGuard Technology - High protection from rain and mud.
Trail Specific Outsole - Delivers uphill and downhill traction on differing terrain.
Solyte Midsole Material - Lighter than the standard EVA, also enhances cushioning and durability.
Rearfoot GEL Cushioning System -Attenuates shock during impact phase and allows for a smooth transition to midstance.
Anti-Gravel Tongue - Protects the foot from dirt and preventing the debris from coming in.
